definition.text: This type of switch is used to spawn different types of weight vote nodes, and to reference “class” type of nodes within the different hierarchies that define Project incentives.

paragraphs.text: When a Weight Votes Switch references any of the existing “class” type of nodes in the Pools, Positions, Features, and Assets hierarchies, the Install Missing Votes option on the menu becomes usable.
Installing votes allows mapping entire sections of project definitions so that you may vote to incentivize multiple definitions easily.
